articles.author: Gavin Cooney
articles.title: Shamrock Rovers' European opponents vow to avenge the 'evil' of being forced to fly via Shannon Airport - The42
articles.description: Shkupi of North Macedonia have slammed the Irish government, describing the failure to fly via Dublin as a ‘cheap game that has no place in football.’
articles.content:
SHAMROCK ROVERS EUROPA League opponents, Shkupi of North Macedonia, have today published a dramatic statement vowing to avenge the evil of being forced to travel to the game via Shannon airport.

articles.title: Archie Battersbee: European court rejects appeal to prolong life support - The Irish Times
articles.description: Court refuses application by parents of 12-year-old who has been in a coma since April
articles.content:
The European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) has rejected an application by the parents of Archie Battersbee for it to stop his life support treatment from being removed.
